awards:
第25届欧洲电影奖(2012)
　　最佳纪录片 伊丽莎白·加巴 / 海因兹·迪尔 / 曼努埃尔·冯·斯图勒

　　第28届美国摄影协会奖(2014)
　　聚光灯奖(提名) 卡米尔·科塔诺德

director.name: 曼努埃尔·冯·斯图勒 Manuel von Stürler

introduction: There’s snow on the ground and shepherds Carole and Pascal are heading through French-speaking Switzerland with three donkeys, four dogs and 800 sheep. Skirting main roads, railway tracks, suburban houses, and industrial estates, moving over fields and through forests. They meet local people, the farmers they are friends with, as well as those unwilling to let the sheep cross t...
